climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: A nourishing body lotion with shea butter and vitamin E and a light vanilla musk scent to stimulate the senses
Formulated with vitamin E and shea butter which help moisturize and leave skin feeling soft and smooth
100% recycled aluminum bottle with a reusable pump. Refill version with aluminum cap also available.
Massage onto skin, AM and PM
Dermatologist tested, vegan, not tested on animals
Made in U.S.A. of U.S. and imported ingredients
body.description: Better begins with Aware—everyday essentials, consciously created. This nourishing daily body lotion is made with shea butter and vitamin E and a light vanilla musk scent to stimulate the senses. It’s dermatologist tested, vegan, and not tested on animals.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,334 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #1,123 in Body Lotions #4,808 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Health and Household

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why did you create Amazon Aware? Customers want to shop more consciously; we want to make that easier. Amazon Aware is a line of everyday essentials across apparel, home, beauty and more - all with third-party certifications featured in our Climate Pledge Friendly program. How are Amazon Aware products certified? Amazon Aware products feature certifications that are part of Amazon’s Climate Pledge Friendly program. Certifications are chosen by product type - for example, for our apparel products, we selected certifications such as Global Recycled Standard. What is Climate Pledge Friendly? Climate Pledge Friendly helps you discover and shop for more-sustainable products. The program highlights products that have sustainability certifications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish bottle was larger.
reviews.reviewText: Wonderfully rich body lotion. Very light scent of vanilla. Moisturizer soaks right into dry skin leaving a silky feeling and not a greasy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because of its clean ingredients and it’s inexpensive price but I’ve come to really like how it smells like warm vanilla and is easy to apply, it is a nice looking bottle, and it keeps my skin hydrated!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good and is lightweight!
reviews.reviewText: I found this product after seeing some reviews on TikTok about how great it is for the price and they weren’t wrong! Amazon did great with this lotion. If you have super dry skin and you’re trying to fix an issue Im not sure this would be your best bet, however if you just need a daily moisturizer for normal skin this is it! You get so much product for the money, and like I said it smells absolutely amazing but it’s not too powerful. I don’t like when anything masks my purfume so this is good for that. It’s lightweight and doesn’t feel heavy or oily on my skin. I would definitely purchase again :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter to use as a daily moisturizer. It doesn't smell too strong and is perfect for daily use. I'm picky about the thickness and weight a lotion feels/leaves on your skin and this is light and leaves your skin soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice lotion at a really great price. I also love that the bottle is reusable metal! Definitely recommend and will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Aware Daily Body Lotion with Vitamin E & Shea Butter, Vegan, Vanilla Musk
reviews.reviewText: I choose this lotion because it was on the EWG list of safe products and I was looking for a new body lotion. I’m disappointed in not only the product but the EWG. Pros: I like that the bottle isn’t plastic. The lotion feels good going on and sinks in quick, not leaving you feeling greasy. You can’t beat the price point. Cons: the Vanilla Musk scent smells very artificial and as soon as I put it on I had a reaction to the smell. I’m not an allergic person but my eyes got itchy and my nose became stuffed up. I threw it out and won’t be ordering this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The lotion is nice, the problem is the pump
reviews.reviewText: I like this lotion. It is light and smells lovely. It isn't greasy at all and is quickly absorbed. After a couple of weeks, I thought the pump had broken. It wasn't dispensing lotion but I could tell there was at least 1/4 of the bottle left. I took the pump out and discovered that the tube is at least 2 inches short of the bottom of the container. I can't get the remainder of the product out easily, so its quite a waste. Very disappointing. The pump needs a simple redesign with longer tube.…if you don't mind throwing away 1/4 of the bottle, this lotion is fine.UPDATE - I purchased another bottle of this lotion and it has a better pump. My first bottle was actually missing a piece of tubing. Not sure why the tubing would be in 2 pieces but it is.PS - the price on this lotion has TRIPLED since I purchased it on October 27th so sadly, I won't be buying it again at this new price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just wait for this product to have thousands of reviews
reviews.reviewText: Nice and hydrating, smells like Christmas morning but not too intense, great price point, recyclable packaging, ewg verified. I’m impressed! Just ordered a bunch for Christmas presents.
